intro: Psychotria waianensis, commonly known as the Hawaiian psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the Hawaiian Islands. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pale pink flowers. It is typically found in moist, shaded habitats such as rainforests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
